statements: UPDATE music_streaming_statistics SET num_streams = 1000 WHERE song_id = 1;
UPDATE music_streaming_statistics SET artist_name = 'Ariana Grande', release_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE song_name = 'Thank U, Next';
UPDATE music_streaming_statistics SET num_streams = 1000, release_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE song_id = 1
UPDATE music_streaming_statistics SET artist_name = 'Taylor Swift', num_streams = 1500 WHERE song_name = 'Blank Space'
UPDATE music_streaming_stats SET stream_count = stream_count + 10 WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET total_likes = total_likes + 1, last_streamed_at = '2022-03-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 98765;
UPDATE music_streaming_stats SET stream_count = stream_count + 10 WHERE id = 100;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET total_likes = total_likes + 1, last_streamed_at = '2022-07-15 14:30:00' WHERE user_id = 500;
UPDATE song_statistics SET num_streams = 100 WHERE song_id = 'dcb79bff-c06e-4de9-a86a-1edc55072cd3';
UPDATE user_statistics SET num_likes_given = 50, num_login = 10 WHERE user_id = '769aee69-7b59-4c18-bbb3-4d6d025a68e3';
UPDATE song_statistics SET num_streams = num_streams + 10, num_likes = num_likes + 5 WHERE song_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_activity SET action_timestamp = current_timestamp(), action_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = '456e7654-e98b-21d3-b654-642317146000' AND song_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE song_streams SET stream_count = 1000 WHERE song_id = 'f62e4a6d-ec1c-4ea8-bb7f-88b1c30a7440';
UPDATE user_profile SET email = 'newemail@example.com', date_registered = '2022-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = '0747eae8-7e61-48b4-9913-9302ef2b001c';
UPDATE song_streams SET stream_count = 1000 WHERE song_id = '02175ae4-75fe-4a29-a2d8-7d5c30a149d4' AND user_id = '52f0bf80-5099-4aa5-802f-4f8e7e368a4e';
UPDATE user_profile SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = '52f0bf80-5099-4aa5-802f-4f8e7e368a4e';
UPDATE song_statistics SET plays = 100, likes = 50 WHERE song_id = 1;
UPDATE user_playlist_mapping SET playlist_id = 5, user_id = 10;
UPDATE song_statistics SET plays = plays + 10, likes = likes + 5 WHERE song_id = 101;
UPDATE user_statistics SET total_plays = total_plays + 20, total_downloads = total_downloads + 2 WHERE user_id = 201;
